What is our return policy?: Returns accepted within 30 days with receipt.
How do I reset my password?: Go to the login page, choose 'Forgot Password', and follow the emailed steps.
What are business hours?: We are open from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.
How do I submit an expense report?: Use the staff portal at https://expenses.company.com and upload receipts within 7 days.
How do I look up SEC filings?: Ask the assistant for 'Company Form' (example: 'Apple 10-K') after enabling network tools.
